title: Just test of first criteria in trial to compare to modifiers

operands.value: at least one measurable lesion (other than bone)
lesion has not been previously irradiated
lesion has demonstrated progression since the radiation therapy

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('at least one measurable lesion (other than bone)'), Symbol('biopsy-proven metastatic carcinoid tumors'), Or(Symbol('other neuroendocrine tumors (Gastrinomas)'), Symbol('other neuroendocrine tumors (Islet cell)'), Symbol('other neuroendocrine tumors (VIPomas)')), Or(Symbol('lesion has not been previously irradiated'), And(Symbol('lesion has been previously irradiated'), Symbol('lesion has demonstrated progression since the radiation therapy'))))
